name: Fundacion para la Mejora de la Vida, la Cultura y la Sociedad
goal:
We are a national, european and international foundation, registered with number 1780 under the protectorate of the Ministry of Education, Culture and Sports, an are members of the Spanish Association of Foundations.
Our goal is a sustainable improvement of individuals and society at large, through the promotion of Fundamental rights, Tolerance and secular methodologies for the improvement of the capabilities of the individuals and groups.
interests: Borders and Security, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: We are registered at the Civil Society Platform of the EU Fundamental Rights Agency, and we are promoting through conferences the fundamental rights covered in the different treatis and covenants subscribe by Spain and other European countries
